Home.tagline: Collaborate in any language and medium
Home.heroSubtitle: Spin up the multi-format storytelling platform with a production-ready Next.js foundation, localization scaffolding, and Supabase integration.

featureCreation.title: Creator-first authoring
featureCreation.body: Launch a modular workspace for drafting and publishing text, audio, video, and interactive chapters side by side.

featureCommunity.title: Community collaboration
featureCommunity.body: Lay the groundwork for likes, comments, and continuation chains that keep stories evolving together.

featureAi.title: AI-assisted inspiration
featureAi.body: Connect future Finish This prompts to OpenAI-powered completions via Supabase Edge Functions.
